T11bsa0553u:3: yatsattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmīvivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ /
T11bsa0553u:9: na punaḥ kāraṇagatau kāryyagatau vā kramākramāvasya vyāpakau /
T11bsa0553u:12: tasmāt kāraṇagatayā kramākramikāryyaviṣayatayā vyāpyamānā kāraṇaśaktiḥ kramākramavyāptetyucyate /
T11bsa0553u:15: tataśca yadyapi sarvvatra kramākramau sattvasya vyāpakāvityādyucyate /
T11bsa0553u:22: kaḥ punarasau vyāptiprasādhako vyāpakānupalambha iti cet /
T11bsa0553u:27: nāsti ca nityābhimatasya bhāvasya kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvamiti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:29: nityasya dharmmiṇaḥ kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvena vyāpakena saha virodhasadbhāvāt,
T11bsa0553u:30: tathā hi pūrvvāparakālayorekatve nityatvaṃ kṣaṇadvayepi bhede kramākramitvaṃ /
T11bsa0553u:37: tathā hi na tāvat kramākramābhyāmanyaḥ prakārosti,
T11bsa0553u:47: tathāhi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi pramāṇasidvatvāt,
T11bsa0553u:53: pratīti rhi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
T11bsa0553u:54: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ /
T11bsa0553u:57: antimapakṣe tu na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syāt vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāt /
T11bsa0553u:58: api ca tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
T11bsa0553u:67: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
T11bsa0553u:88: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśe ṣāṇi kāryyāṇi kuryyāditi cet /
T11bsa0553u:95: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi janayet /
T11bsa0553u:99: atrocyate / satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryyañjanayati na tu tenaiva /
T11bsa0553u:104: ye hi kāryyamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryyotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kāryye 'nuvarttamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
T11bsa0553u:106: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva karttāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryyaṃ vidadyuḥ /
T11bsa0553u:108: na ceyatā svarūpeṇa na karttāraḥ svarūpakārakatvanirvvāhaparatayā vyāpārasamāveśāditi //
T11bsa0553u:109: kiñca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca satvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatirekopyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:113: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisidviḥ /
T11bsa0553u:115: kiñca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati nāpyanumānataḥ,
T11bsa0553u:120: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu brūvata vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
T11bsa0553u:124: api ca kimidaṃ vādhakamakṣaṇikānāmasattāṃ sādha yati,
T11bsa0553u:132: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā tadvetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikaṃ /
T11bsa0553u:135: tadā pūrvvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpyo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:139: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakya iti /
T11bsa0553u:147: yathā tuhinadahanayoḥ sāpekṣadhruvabhāvayośca pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
T11bsa0553u:153: tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ kālpaniko vā /
T11bsa0553u:157: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjaliriti /
T11bsa0553u:160: hetoḥ svānubhavasya cākṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
T11bsa0553u:161: śūnyaśca dvitīyena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasidvirasatā śakyā kramāderapīti //
T11bsa0553u:162: atrocyate / iha vastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭoyathā gavi gotvaṃ,
T11bsa0553u:164: avastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vakratvābhāvo gagaṇāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
T11bsa0553u:174: yenaiva hi vacanenāvastuno dharmmitvābhāvena dharmmeṇa dharmmatvamabhyupagataṃ /
T11bsa0553u:176: tathāhyavastuno dharmmitvannāstīti vacanena dharmmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastu vidhīyate,
T11bsa0553u:183: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāt iti kathamavastuno dharmmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:186: tathāvastuno dharmmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmmitvasvīkārapūrvvatvena vyāptaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:191: tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanavirodhasidviḥ /
T11bsa0553u:193: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ pariharttumiti mahati saṅkaṭe praveśaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:194: avastuprastāve sahṛdayāṇāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet /
T11bsa0553u:196: avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsarttumicchati /
T11bsa0553u:197: nacāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamarddanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedvuṃ śakyate /
T11bsa0553u:198: tataścātrāpi kramākramābhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastyātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmmitvaṃ kena pratihanyate
T11bsa0553u:199: trividho hi dharmmo dṛṣṭaḥ kaścidvastuniyato nīlādiḥ /
T11bsa0553u:208: kevalamasau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratīti rvastvavastunorekarūpā na bhavati /
T11bsa0553u:212: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratīti ryathāsākṣātpratyakṣaṃ paramparayā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo 'numānañca /
T11bsa0553u:215: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vyavaharttavyaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:219: tataścākṣaṇikasya vikalpamātrasidvatve yaduktaṃ na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syadvikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāditi tatasaṅgataṃ
T11bsa0553u:220: vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sambhave 'pi vastudharmmeṇa dharmmitvāyogāt /
T11bsa0553u:237: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryyakāraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt /
T11bsa0553u:241: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
T11bsa0553u:243: yadā tāvadamī mīlitāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu ko ni ṣedvā /
T11bsa0553u:249: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryyotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat
T11bsa0553u:250: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatte rnavā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryyotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhati
T11bsa0553u:253: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñānadūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasidvidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryyaṃ /
T11bsa0553u:258: bhavatu tāvannijāgantukabhedena dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tathāpi tatprātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
T11bsa0553u:262: na ca kāryyaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktaṃ /
T11bsa0553u:264: hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryyannakaroti tadā tatkāryyameva tanna syāt,
T11bsa0553u:273: kiṃ kurmma uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet /
T11bsa0553u:275: śthiratve 'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryyaṃ karotīti cet / na /
T11bsa0553u:279: kāryye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet / na /
T11bsa0553u:280: sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvamavāryyamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt /
T11bsa0553u:281: kāryyasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ karttumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati /
T11bsa0553u:283: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
T11bsa0553u:288: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatvepyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva sidhyati /
T11bsa0553u:289: evaṃ kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ byāptamiti kramākramayoranyo 'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvādetatprakāradvayaparihāreṇārthakriyākāritvamanyatra na gatamityarthaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:293: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścit vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vikalpādeva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:295: evaṃ vaidharmmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratītiḥ /
T11bsa0553u:299: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiñca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvāt iti sthitaṃ /
T11bsa0553u:300: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātrantadā na tasya sādhyabudvijanakatvamavastutvāt /
T11bsa0553u:301: na cānyopalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhirabhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivat anyasya kasyacidanupalabdheriti cet tadasaṅgataṃ /
T11bsa0553u:303: yathā neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhirdṛśyānupalabdhiḥ /
T11bsa0553u:304: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhireva śiṃśapābhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:305: tathā hi nityasya dharmmiṇo vikalpabudvyadhyavasi tasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇameva kramikāritvā kramikāritvānupalambha arthakriyāpekṣayā ca /
T11bsa0553u:314: ayañca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmmiṇi tathāvastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:318: tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmmiṇā sārdvaṃ ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau nitye 'pi yadi bhavataḥ /
T11bsa0553u:319: nityagrāhiṇā jñānena svadharmmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti sambhāvanayā /
T11bsa0553u:322: yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet /
T11bsa0553u:326: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryyaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatayā durvvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:337: yadyādyaḥ pakṣastadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāśca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastuprativadvatvamapi na kṣīṇaṃ /
T11bsa0553u:338: na ca dvitīye 'pi pakṣe doṣaḥ sambhavati /
T11bsa0553u:342: paryyudāsavṛttyā budvisvabhāva bhūtā kṣaṇikākāre vastubhūte dharmmiṇi prativadvatvasambhavāt /
T11bsa0553u:343: ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:344: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādityādyantarbhāvayituṃ śakyo na tathāyamiti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:354: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisidvau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya
T11bsa0553u:355: vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhakāt
T11bsa0553u:357: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaprasaṅgo bhinna nyāyatvāt /
T11bsa0553u:362: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmmā heturavastuni vikalpamātrasidve dharmmiṇi nāśrayāsidvidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:370: tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇika svarūpasya tat pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt /
T11bsa0553u:375: na hi virodhonāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādaṃ sambadvābhidhānamiṣyate 'smābhirupapadyate vā /
T11bsa0553u:380: nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yamanayorasaṅkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:383: nanu nityatvakramayaugapadyavattvañca virudvau vidhūya nāparo virodhonāma /
T11bsa0553u:385: na hi dharmmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:386: kintu virudvayordharmmayoḥ sadbhāve 'nyathā virodhanāmadharmmāntarasambhave 'pi yadi na virudvau dharmmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasadbhāvaḥ /
T11bsa0553u:387: virudvau ca dharmmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ /
T11bsa0553u:391: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
T11bsa0553u:392: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na vā sattāpi sattāyathā
T11bsa0553u:401: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikādvinivarttamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva eva viśrāmyante na vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviṃravirodhinī //
